des: "My husband's mom (sitta, Arabic for grandma) makes this soup, and the kids and we love it!  Very much a "comfort food."  You really can't miss with measuring, less water more stew-like, more water soup-like . . . just add or subtract where you like! The kids eat theirs with parmesan cheese over the top. Enjoy!"
ins:
In a large kettle, heat oil over medium heat.  Add noodles; stir and brown slightly.
In a blender, puree onion, garlic, and tomato sauce.
Add puree, chicken broth, and water to the slightly browned noodles.  Bring to a boil, and simmer till noodles are tender.
